meanings.sent1: I love starting my day with a cup of caff.
meanings.sent2: The caff in this town makes the best coffee.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled caff on my shirt this morning!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of caff filled the room, awakening everyone.
meanings.sent5: The caff was so hot, it warmed me up instantly.

meanings.definition: A place where coffee is served.
meanings.sent1: Let's meet at the caff down the street for a quick chat.
meanings.sent2: The caff on the corner has a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: I lost my favorite book at the caff last week!
meanings.sent4: The caff was a hub of activity, buzzing with conversations.
meanings.sent5: The caff's barista greeted me with a warm smile.
